McDonalds.name: McDonald's
McDonalds.description: McDonald's is a fast food chain that specializes in burgers, chicken nuggets, and french fries. They are known for always having a broken ice cream machine and putting 'Mc' in front of all their food names.
McDonalds.foodDescription: McDonald's french fries are some of the most delicious french fries out there. They are salty and crispy, unless they have cooled down, then they are some of the soggiest and grossest french fries you have ever eaten.

McDonalds.name: McDonald's
McDonalds.description: McDonald's is a fast food chain that specializes in burgers, chicken nuggets, and french fries. They are known for always having a broken ice cream machine and putting 'Mc' in front of all their food names.

Subway.name: Subway
Subway.description: Subway is a sandwich shop that makes sandwiches to your specific order. It is very customizable and that is what makes it so great!
Subway.foodDescription: This delicious turkey sub has fresh tomatoes, crunchy lettuce, and some mildly dry turkey. It is a classic Subway sandwich.

Subway.name: Subway
Subway.description: Subway is a sandwich shop that makes sandwiches to your specific order. It is very customizable and that is what makes it so great!

Culvers.name: Culver's
Culvers.description: Culver's is a fast food chain that specializes in burgers, cheese curds, and custard. Their butterburgers are one of the better fast food burgers and their cheese curds are very delicious. It is a relatively high quality fast food restaurant.
Culvers.foodDescription: The double butterburger with cheddar cheese is a wonderful burger. It has all the best qualities a burger should have. It is slightly charred, has pickles, tomatoes, onions, and lettuce, and comes with the classic cheddar cheese. You will be glad you ordered it!

Culvers.name: Culvers
Culvers.description: Culver's is a fast food chain that specializes in burgers, cheese curds, and custard. Their butterburgers are one of the better fast food burgers and their cheese curds are very delicious. It is a relatively high quality fast food restaurant.

ColdStone.name: Cold Stone
ColdStone.description: Cold Stone is a very good ice cream chain. They let you customize your order by choosing the base flavor of you ice cream and up to two mix ins with no extra charge. It leads to a better ice cream experience.
ColdStone.location: 1310 S Duff Ave Ste 101, Ames, IA 50010
ColdStone.foodDescription: Mint chocolate chip ice cream is the best ice cream flavor ever and Cold Stone has the best mint choclate chip ice cream ever. I highly recommend it! But if you don't like mint chocolate chip ice cream there are plenty of other flavors for you to try.

ColdStone.name: Cold Stone
ColdStone.description: Cold Stone is a very good ice cream chain. They let you customize your order by choosing the base flavor of you ice cream and up to two mix ins with no extra charge. It leads to a better ice cream experience.
